entry.title: [unSYSTEM] DarkWallet Best Practices
entry.summary: On December 19, 2013, Amir Taaki shared a link with the subject of signing each commit. Linus had advised against it and upon reading the link shared by Amir Taaki, it was found that his advice made no sense. However, Linus's recommendation for signing tags with `git tag -s` should probably be incorporated into the spec as a MUST according to Drak's response.
